item.title: 南非市场支持拉马福萨，兰特跨越里程碑
item.description: 在西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）开始新一届南非总统任期前几个小时，交易商们对他投下了信任票。【原文：Hours before Cyril Ramaphosa begins another term as South Africa’s president, traders are giving him a vote of confidence.】

item.title: 泰国《皇家侮辱法》与前总理他信案件
item.description: 泰国前总理他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）被指控犯有诽谤、侮辱或威胁国王或其近亲属的罪行。此案围绕他信在2015年发表的言论展开，表明他信的政党去年与一帮亲王室和与军方结盟的政党达成的权力分享协议可能开始瓦解，有可能使这个东南亚国家陷入另一场政治动荡。【原文：Former Thai prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra has been charged under a law known as lese majeste that makes it a crime to defame, insult or threaten the king or his close family members. The case, which centers around comments Thaksin made in 2015, suggests that a power sharing deal his party struck with a clutch of pro-royalist and military-aligned parties last year may be starting to unravel, threatening to tip the Southeast Asian country into another bout of political turmoil.】

item.title: 服务业高通胀令英国央行 8 月降息的赌注破灭
item.description: 在数据显示 5 月份服务业通胀率仍高于预期后，交易员们减少了对英国央行将在未来几个月放宽货币政策的押注。【原文：Traders pared bets that the Bank of England will ease monetary policy in the coming months after data showed services sector inflation remained higher than expected in May.】

item.title: 印度季风开始时天气干燥，引发对农作物前景的担忧
item.description: 印度至关重要的季风开局不利，全国降雨量比正常水平低 20%，这引发了人们对糖和大米等主要农作物产量前景的担忧。【原文：India’s crucial monsoon is off to a poor start, with rainfall 20% lower than normal across the country, raising concerns about the production outlook for key crops including sugar and rice.】

item.title: 消息人士称，埃尼公司将聘请顾问出售 10 亿欧元的象牙海岸股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃尼公司（Eni SpA）正计划出售其在象牙海岸上游业务的股份，这笔潜在交易可能价值约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）。【原文：Eni SpA is planning to sell a stake in its Ivory Coast upstream operations in a potential deal that could be worth about €1 billion ($1.1 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 大众汽车公司称中国正在摩洛哥建设欧洲电池供应基地
item.description: 中国电力公司运营主管表示，中国正在摩洛哥为欧洲建立电池供应链，因为欧洲正在努力发展自己的工业，为电动汽车制造提供原料。【原文：China is building a battery supply chain for Europe in Morocco, as the continent struggles to develop its own industry to feed electric-car manufacturing, PowerCo’s operations head said.】

item.title: 中国证监会推出一揽子政策扶持明星市场
item.description: 中国将努力改善中国明星市场上企业的融资状况，并加大对科技密集型板块上企业间兼并的支持力度。【原文：China will work to improve financing for firms on the country’s Star Market and increase support for mergers between companies on the tech-heavy board.】

item.title: 爱尔兰航空预计夏季航班将因飞行员抗议薪酬而受到严重影响
item.description: 爱尔兰国旗航空公司爱尔兰航空（Aer Lingus）预计，由于航空公司飞行员下周开始采取工业行动，繁忙的暑假期间航班将受到干扰。【原文：Irish flag carrier Aer Lingus expects disruptions to its schedule over the busy summer vacation period as the airlines pilots begin industrial action next week.】

item.title: 纳斯达克瑞典交易所因内幕交易缺陷遭监管机构罚款
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc）在瑞典的证券交易所被该国金融监管部门罚款 1 亿瑞典克朗（约合 960 万美元），原因是该交易所在追踪内幕交易违规行为方面存在缺陷。【原文：Nasdaq Inc’s stock exchange in Sweden has been fined 100 million Swedish kronor ($9.6 million) by the country’s financial watchdog over deficiencies in how the bourse keeps track of insider dealing violations.】

item.title: 摩根大通称外资持有的印度债券将增加近一倍
item.description: 华尔街银行表示，随着印度即将加入摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）的主要新兴市场指数，明年外国持有的印度政府债券将几乎翻一番，达到未偿债务的 4.4%。【原文：Foreign ownership of Indian government bonds will almost double to 4.4% of the outstanding debt over the next year with the nation’s imminent addition to the JPMorgan Chase & Co’s main emerging-market index, the Wall Street bank said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促丹麦采取更多房地产风险保障措施
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，丹麦需要采取更多措施来解决其房地产市场的 "薄弱环节"。【原文：Denmark needs additional measures to address “pockets of vulnerabilities” in its real estate market, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: 前日本央行行长称上田对物价更有信心
item.description: 据上个月结束任期的一位前日本央行执行董事称，日本央行行长上田一夫最近的言论显然让他对通胀前景更有信心。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda is apparently becoming more confident on the outlook for inflation based on his recent comments, according to a former BOJ executive director who finished her term last month.】

item.title: 日本 Topix 将扩大业务范围，削减公司数量
item.description: 东京证券交易所将扩大日本基准 Topix 指数的股票范围，同时减少成份股数量，以增强该指数作为可投资指标的吸引力。【原文：The Tokyo Stock Exchange will widen the universe of stocks that are included in Japan’s benchmark Topix index while reducing the number of constituents, as it seeks to boost the appeal as an investable gauge.】

item.title: 韩国经常账户中的中美差距扩大至创纪录水平
item.description: 去年，中美两国在韩国经常账户中的差距扩大到创纪录的水平，凸显了首尔与世界两大经济体贸易关系的变化速度。【原文：The gap between the US and China in South Korea’s current account widened to a record last year, underscoring the pace of change in Seoul’s trade relations with the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: 佩洛西在访问中指责中国试图抹杀西藏文化
item.description: 美国前众议院议长南希-佩洛西（Nancy Pelosi）周三在达赖喇嘛位于印度北部的家中高调会见达赖喇嘛后，指责中国试图抹杀西藏文化。【原文：Former US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi accused China of trying to erase Tibetan culture following her high-profile meeting with the Dalai Lama at his home in northern India Wednesday, a visit condemned by Beijing.】

item.title: 印度最大的债券持有者向摩根大通的需求抛售债券
item.description: 印度的国有贷款机构已成为政府债券的积极卖家，而外资银行则在全球指数纳入印度之前大举介入。【原文：India’s state-owned lenders have turned aggressive sellers of government bonds while foreign banks are piling in ahead of the global index inclusion.】

item.title: 交易商可能高估日本央行削减债券购买规模的影响
item.description: 对于日本央行行长所说的 "大幅 "削减债券购买量将产生的影响，交易员们的看法似乎过于夸张。【原文：Traders appear to be going overboard in their view of the impact that will result from the Bank of Japan reducing bond buying by what its governor called a “substantial” amount.】

item.title: 交易商押注南非通胀将放缓至目标水平
item.description: 越来越多的交易商押注南非通胀将放缓至该国央行目标区间的中点，从而为决策者在今年最后一个季度转入降息周期提供空间。【原文：Traders are increasingly betting that South African inflation will slow toward the midpoint of the range targeted by the country’s central bank, giving policymakers room to pivot to an interest-rate cutting cycle by the final quarter of the year.】

item.title: 俄罗斯考虑将汽油出口许可延长至六月以后
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由于国内供应仍然充足，俄罗斯正在考虑允许其炼油厂在 6 月以后继续出口汽油。【原文：Russia is considering permitting its refiners to continue exporting gasoline beyond June as domestic supplies remain plentiful, according to the people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英国通胀率近三年来首次达到 2% 的目标
item.description: 英国通胀率近三年来首次降至英格兰银行的目标值，为今年晚些时候降息提供了支持。【原文：UK inflation fell to the Bank of England’s target for the first time in almost three years, supporting the case for interest-rate reductions later this year.】

item.title: 沃达丰出售印度塔公司 18 亿美元的股份，条款显示
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）的子公司通过在交易所执行的大宗交易出售印度 Indus Towers Ltd. 公司的股票，筹集了约 18 亿美元的资金。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc subsidiaries have raised about $1.8 billion in proceeds by selling shares in India’s Indus Towers Ltd. in block deals executed on exchanges.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：通胀率自 2021 年以来首次回到英国央行 2% 的目标值

item.title: 香港股市因市场提振政策有望出台而跳涨
item.description: 受对中国资本市场潜在改革的乐观情绪以及追赶地区涨幅的推动，香港股市周三领涨亚洲。【原文：Hong Kong stocks led gains in Asia on Wednesday, driven by optimism over potential Chinese capital market reforms and a catch-up to regional advances.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气交易商今夏关注五大驱动因素
item.description: 夏季曾是欧洲天然气市场的淡季，但连续第三年的夏季将充满紧张气氛。【原文：Summer used to be a slow season for Europe’s gas market, but for a third year in a row, it’s shaping up to be full of tension.】

item.title: 基金继续看涨，央行却屏住呼吸
item.description:
投资者仍在扎堆投资 "华丽七重奏"，而降息则在等待通胀的到来。【原文：

Investors are still piling into the Magnificent Seven, while rate cuts wait on inflation.

】

item.title: 据说日本将考虑发行期限更短的债券
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份提案草案，日本财务省正在权衡一项计划，即把更多的债券发行转向期限较短的债券，这是在日本央行削减国债购买量之际做出的一项重大改变。【原文：Japan’s Ministry of Finance is weighing a plan to shift more of its bond issuance to shorter maturities, according to a draft proposal seen by Bloomberg, a major change as the central bank moves to cut purchases of government debt.】

item.title: 欧盟将就预算赤字问题抨击法国，为法国政治雪上加霜
item.description: 在立法选举投票开始前不到两周的时间里，欧盟将对法国违反集团赤字和债务规定的行为提出警告，这将触发一个可能导致巨额罚款的程序，并使竞选优先事项复杂化。【原文：The European Union is set to admonish France for breaking the bloc’s deficit and debt rules, triggering a process that can lead to onerous fines and complicating campaign priorities less than two weeks before voting starts in legislative elections.】

item.title: 瑞士央行的沉默为降息埋下另一个悬念
item.description: 瑞士国家银行本周的决定又将是一场关于官员们是降息还是按兵不动的争论。【原文：The Swiss National Bank decision this week is set to be another nail-biter on whether officials will cut their interest rate or stay on hold.】

item.title: 顶级投资者称英国股市将从荒野中反击
item.description: 在 2024 年，一只价值 16 亿英镑（20 亿美元）的英国基金击败了大多数同行，该基金的经理预测，无论英国大选结果如何，英国股市都将大幅复兴。【原文：The manager of a £1.6 billion ($2 billion) UK fund that’s beaten the majority of peers in 2024 is predicting a big revival for British stocks — no matter the outcome of the country’s election.】
